import React from "react"; const PostItem = ({post1}) => { return (
  • {post1.username} {post1.time} {post1.content1}
    {post1.title1st} {post1.title2nd} {post1.title3rd}
    {post1.title4th}
    {post1.content2}
    {post1.link}
        {post1.message}     {post1.trans}     {post1.love}
    • ); }; export default PostItem;
